chemicals_used.name: LiTCNQ
chemicals_used.amount: 0.2 mmol, 42 mg for single crystal; 0.3 mmol, 69.6 mg for bulk

chemicals_used.name: bpy
chemicals_used.amount: 0.2 mmol, 31 mg for single crystal; 0.3 mmol, 51.5 mg for bulk

chemicals_used.name: Zn(NO3)2·6H2O
chemicals_used.amount: 0.2 mmol, 59.5 mg for single crystal; 0.3 mmol, 98.3 mg for bulk

synthesis_conditions.time: A few weeks for single crystal formation

synthesis_conditions.guest_exchange_method: Single crystal of 1⊃MeOH was immersed into about 2 ml of benzene for ten seconds, resulting in a color change from yellow to red.

characterization_methods.1H NMR: No peak assigned to TCNQ and bpy, indicating no dissolution of the crystal.
characterization_methods.ESR: Broad singlet observed, total integrated intensity of the peaks corresponded to 0.1% of the amount of the TCNQ moiety in the sample.
